original_text: The Lord will send a message to foreign nations to come and attack. He calls to nations that are far away, and now they are already coming! Their armies march quickly to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 또 그가 기치를 세우시고 먼 나라들을 불러 땅 끝에서부터 자기에게로 오게 하실 것이라 보라 그들이 빨리 달려올 것이로되

sentences.original_text: The Lord will send a message
to foreign nations to come and attack
He calls to nations that are far away
and now they are already coming
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이제 그들은 이미 오고 있다
